variables.name: base_name
variables.description: String: base name of created resources

variables.name: create_resource_group
variables.description: Boolean: create the resource group or ingest existing.

variables.name: existing_resource_group_name
variables.description: String: name of the existing resource group to ingest.

variables.name: create_law
variables.description: Boolean: create a log analytics workspace or not.

variables.name: create_managed_identity
variables.description: Boolean: create a user defined managed identity or ingest existing.

variables.name: existing_managed_identity_name
variables.description: String: name of the existing managed identity to ingest.

variables.name: existing_managed_identity_rg
variables.description: String: name of the resource group of the existing managed identity to ingest.

variables.name: create_acr
variables.description: Boolean: create an Azure Container Registry or not.

variables.name: create_vnet
variables.description: Boolean: create a VNET or ingest existing.

variables.name: new_vnet_address_space
variables.description: String: if creating a new VNET, it's address space represented as a CIDR.

variables.name: existing_vnet_rg_name
variables.description: String: if ingesting an existing VNET, it's resource group.

variables.name: existing_vnet_rg_location
variables.description: String: if ingesting an existing VNET, it's Azure region.

variables.name: existing_vnet_name
variables.description: String: if ingesting an existing VNET, it's name.

variables.name: create_subnet
variables.description: Boolean: create a subnet or ingest existing.

variables.name: new_subnet_address_prefixes
variables.description: String: if creating a new subnet, it's address space represented as a CIDR.

variables.name: existing_subnet_id
variables.description: String: if ingesting an existing subnet, it's Azure resource ID.

variables.name: is_hub
variables.description: Boolean: is the home of the tfstate storage account.

variables.name: install_remote
variables.description: Boolean: create tfstate storage.

variables.name: azdo_service_connection
variables.description: String: name of existing AzDO service connection for use in pipelines.

variables.name: azdo_project_name
variables.description: String: name of existing AzDO project that holds variable groups and pipelines.

variables.name: azdo_variable_group_name
variables.description: String: name of AzDO variable group to contain resource group module vars.
